Hypertable::FixedStreamBuf

Hypertable::FixedStreamBuf Class Reference

A simple streambuf with fixed size buffer Convenient for limitting size of output; faster than ostringstream and friends, which require heap allocations. More...

#include <FixedStream.h>

Detailed Description

A simple streambuf with fixed size buffer Convenient for limitting size of output; faster than ostringstream and friends, which require heap allocations.
